imagenes.descripcion: The Swpeet kit includes 3 Chinese glass working tools: glass cutting pliers, glass breaker pliers and a glass cutter with oil reservoir. It is ideal for both beginners and glass professionals.

The Chinese window polishing kit is a set of tools for removing scratches from windshields and windows. It contains a wax polishing pad and polishing powder. With this kit, you can effectively remove and polish scratches from the glass surface to improve the appearance of your car. Follow the instructions for safe and effective use.

The SKYMEN JP-010S is a 2L digital ultrasonic cleaner equipped with a heating timer. This 60W ultrasonic machine is ideal for cleaning a wide variety of items, such as dental tools, watches, eyeglasses and coins. It operates on 110 V and includes a US plug. The heating function helps to enhance the cleaning effect. Remember to follow the manufacturer's instructions for safe and effective use.

The Creator's THUMBONIE is a thumb guard for glass grinding. It is designed to protect the thumb from injury while grinding glass. This can be particularly useful for artists and craftsmen who work with glass on a regular basis. Remember to use it correctly to ensure maximum protection.

The FIXM glass bottle cutter kit is a DIY tool designed to cut bottles of different widths. It comes with a complete set of accessories, allowing you to create a wide range of art objects from glass bottles. The adjustable width allows you to cut bottles of different sizes to suit your project needs. Remember to always handle this tool with care and follow the instructions provided for safe and effective use.

The car glass repair kit is a set of Chinese tools for repairing cracks in the windshield. It contains resin liquid, a drill and injection adhesive. With this kit, you can effectively repair cracks and damage to the windshield. It also contains a device for polishing car headlights. Follow the instructions for safe and effective use.

The AC 220V 0.1A automatic angle grinder is a diamond grinding tool for glass art. It is a small Chinese grinder that operates on 220V AC and 0.1A current. This tool is designed for grinding and shaping stained glass. The angle grinder allows you to precisely control the shape and size of the glass piece.

Creator's Palm Runner is a tool designed to aid in the execution of difficult stained glass scores. It is designed to fit comfortably in the hand, allowing you to apply even pressure along the score line. This can make it easier to separate the glass along the intended path.

Set of diamond cutting discs designed for angle grinders. These discs are ideal for grinding glass, jade, crystal, wine bottles and tiles. The green color indicates the specific composition of the disc material, which is optimized for these types of materials.

Chinese tool for cutting glass in the shape of a circle. It has a suction cup that adheres to the glass and an adjustable compass that allows you to cut perfect circles. The cutter itself is made of an alloy known for its durability and sharpness. This tool is especially useful for window fabricators and others who need to drill holes in glass on a regular basis.

The Tungsten Bail Biter Pilers is a tool designed for lampwork artists. It is used to create perfect balls and loops for beads and pendants. This high quality tool is made of durable steel, and the working part is made of tungsten. It creates a hole of approximately 1.5 mm in diameter. The tungsten material ensures that the pliers will last longer than traditional pliers, even with frequent use.

The KOKITEA Double-Sided Window Cleaner Glass Wiper is a Chinese tool for cleaning double-glazed windows in high-rise buildings. It has an adjustable magnetic slider and 6 large sponges with water storage.
imagenes.urlWeb: The KOKITEA Double-Sided Window Cleaner Glass Wiper is a Chinese tool for cleaning double-glazed windows in high-rise buildings. It has an adjustable magnetic slider and 6 large sponges with water storage.

imagenes.descripcion: The Glass Bottle Cutter, Electric Bottle Cutting Machine, 36 Piece Versatile Rotating Tool Kit is a multifunctional tool ideal for crafts and small family projects. It includes a pure copper motor, adjustable cutting speed of 5000-8000r/min. It can cut and polish various materials.
Chinese tool used to remove the glass from LCD screens of iPhones and Android devices. It is an electric separator bar with steel wire specially designed for repairing LCD separators of cell phones.

Griffin glass tools offer high quality graphite pushers with stainless steel tips. They come in different sizes and are designed with hardwood handles for a comfortable grip. They are praised for their quality and durability.

Griffin Glass Tools Ground Joint Holders are praised for their quality and durability. They are made with a textured stainless steel handle for comfortable handling. The graphite is high density and made to withstand tough working conditions. Sizes currently offered are 10mm, 12mm, 14mm, and 18mm.

Star Flower Lampwork Mashers are a lampwork tool designed to make star flower pins. They are made of high quality brass to prevent glass from sticking. They are very simple to use and ergonomic. They can be used either to make a single flower or to make the center flower.

The Mdvora Crystal China and Glass Repair File, Diamond Glass File, Carbide Metal Diamond Grit Tool, Glass Diamond Saver Multi-Purpose Diamond Sharpener is a tool designed to repair slightly damaged glass, crystal and porcelain. It is made of durable hard alloy steel, embedded with diamond particles. It has a semi-circular design and is small and handy in size.

The W7947 Sortiment von 29 St√ºcke Uhr Kristall Entferner Sterben Vordere Abdeckung Glas Opener Tool Kit is a set of tools for disassembling watch glass and repairing most watches. It contains 29 different parts designed specifically for various types of watches.

Lampwork Pin Holder Lampworking Tool is a tool designed for lampworking. Better than a vice pin, the wire is easier to center and stays secure. The center is hollow, so it accommodates any length of wire.

The 3D Skull Lampwork Mashers are a lampwork tool designed to make skull beads. They are double sided and make a detailed impression. They are made of high quality brass to prevent the glass from sticking. The finished skull measures 17mm high x 12mm wide.

Stained Glass Hand Foiler 1/4 inch Stained Glass Copper Foiling Tool, Short Hand Foiler 1/4 inch Foil Crimper, White is a tool designed to apply copper foil to the edges of stained glass pieces. It speeds up the foiling process by keeping the foil centered on the glass. It is available in three sizes for applying 3/16, 7/32 and 1/4 foil.

Glass tube cutter knife glass tube cutter knife DIY wine beer bottle plastic tube cutting tools cutting knife cutter hand tools. It is a tool used for cutting glass tubes. It is ideal for DIY projects, especially for those who work with wine or beer bottles.

The Handmade Titanium FAT Wax, Glass, Clay, Soap FAT Handmade Titanium Carving Tool is a custom tool designed for hobbies. It is made of titanium, known for its strength and durability. This tool is handmade, indicating a high level of craftsmanship and attention to detail.
